title: 73. Raw Milk Why We Drink it and FAQ
description:
Our family loves drinking raw milk. We have been enjoying it for 9 years now! Join me as I answer some of your FAQ about it! How does it taste? Do I drink raw milk while pregnant? What are the health benefits of raw milk?  

As always, I want to encourage you to do your own research! Just because I say it's healthy, and that we love it, doesn't mean you won't get sick. This is just our personal experience.   

Find raw milk in your area: https://www.realmilk.com/real-milk-finder/ 

Also, ask around in your local Weston Price FB group!  

Raw Milk Kefir Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjuIcSs_-iI&t=1s  

Sources: Love this video from Dr. Axe: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OkSDm710vx0&t=6s 

Chris Kesser- https://chriskresser.com/raw-milk-reality-benefits-of-raw-milk/ 

Weston Price- https://www.westonaprice.org/health-topics/making-it-practical/milk-it-does-a-body-good/ 

https://www.westonaprice.org/not-all-raw-milk-is-produced-equally/ 

https://www.westonaprice.org/podcast/151-is-raw-milk-safe/

Get my free 10 day course on how to start a blog here - https://withered-breeze-7467.ck.page/fc79cda297

Berkey water filter with Simple Farmhouse Life podcast discount- https://www.berkeyfilters.com/collections/simple-farmhouse-life?a_aid=5b2cf1884101a&a_bid=d2a30b6f

You can get the review here- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z8CaB1n31iI
